description: Search local businesses geographically with Yelp database.
steps: Sign up or Log in to Yelp(https://www.yelp.com/)
Click the submit button and receive your Client ID and Client Secret
Use your Client ID and Client secret to call the getAccessToken(https://rapidapi.com/package/YelpAPI/functions/getAccessToken) endpoint

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Allows to get an access token.

args.name: appId
args.info: Your App ID obtained from Yelp.

args.name: appSecret
args.info: Your App Secret obtained from Yelp.

blocks.name: getBusinesses
blocks.description: This endpoint returns up to 1000 businesses based on the provided search criteria. It has some basic information about the business.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: term
args.info: Search term (e.g. "food", "restaurants"). If term isn’t included we search everything. The term keyword also accepts business names such as "Starbucks".

args.name: location
args.info: Required if either coordinate is not provided. Specifies the combination of "address, neighborhood, city, state or zip, optional country" to be used when searching for businesses.

args.name: coordinate
args.info: Required if location is not provided. coordinate of the location you want to search near by coma separated.

args.name: radius
args.info: Search radius in meters. If the value is too large, a AREA_TOO_LARGE error may be returned. The max value is 40000 meters (25 miles).

args.name: categories
args.info: Categories to filter the search results with. See the list of supported categories. The category filter can be a list of comma delimited categories. For example, "bars,french" will filter by Bars and French. The category identifier should be used (for example "discgolf", not "Disc Golf").

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the locale to return the business information in.

args.name: limit
args.info: Number of business results to return. By default, it will return 20. Maximum is 50.

args.name: offset
args.info: Offset the list of returned business results by this amount.

args.name: sortBy
args.info: Sort the results by one of the these modes: best_match, rating, review_count or distance. By default it's best_match. The rating sort is not strictly sorted by the rating value, but by an adjusted rating value that takes into account the number of ratings, similar to a bayesian average. This is so a business with 1 rating of 5 stars doesn’t immediately jump to the top.

args.name: price
args.info: Pricing levels to filter the search result with: 1 = $, 2 = $$, 3 = $$$, 4 = $$$$. The price filter can be a list of comma delimited pricing levels. For example, "1, 2, 3" will filter the results to show the ones that are $, $$, or $$$.

args.name: openNow
args.info: Default to false. When set to true, only return the businesses open now. Notice that open_at and open_now cannot be used together.

args.name: openAt
args.info: An integer represending the Unix time in the same timezone of the search location. If specified, it will return business open at the given time. Notice that open_at and open_now cannot be used together.

args.name: attributes
args.info: Additional filters to restrict search results. Possible values are: hot_and_new, request_a_quote, waitlist_reservation, cashback, deals, gender_neutral_restrooms

blocks.name: getSingleBusiness
blocks.description: This endpoint returns the detail information of a business.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: bussinessId
args.info: The business ID.

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in.

blocks.name: getBusinessesByPhoneNumber
blocks.description: This endpoint returns a list of businesses based on the provided phone number. It is possible for more than one businesses having the same phone number (for example, chain stores with the same +1 800 phone number).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: phone
args.info: Phone number of the business you want to search for. It must start with + and include the country code, like +14159083801.

blocks.name: getBusinessesByTransaction
blocks.description: This endpoint returns a list of businesses which support certain transactions.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: transactionType
args.info: Valid values for transaction_type are: delivery.

args.name: location
args.info: Required when coordinate aren't provided. Address of the location you want to deliver to.

args.name: coordinate
args.info: Required if location is not provided. coordinate of the location you want to search near by coma separated.

blocks.name: getBusinessReviews
blocks.description: This endpoint returns the up to three reviews of a business.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: bussinessId
args.info: The business ID.

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the interface locale; this determines the language of reviews to return.

blocks.name: getAutocomplete
blocks.description: This endpoint returns autocomplete suggestions for search keywords, businesses and categories, based on the input text.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: text
args.info: Text to return autocomplete suggestions for.

args.name: coordinate
args.info: Required if location is not provided. coordinate of the location you want to search near by coma separated.

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in.

blocks.name: getSingleEvent
blocks.description: This endpoint returns the detailed information of a Yelp event.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: eventId
args.info: The event ID.

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in.

blocks.name: searchEvent
blocks.description: This endpoint returns events based on the provided search criteria.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in.

args.name: offset
args.info: Offset the list of returned business results by this amount.

args.name: limit
args.info: Number of business results to return. By default, it will return 20. Maximum is 50.

args.name: sortBy
args.info: Sort by either descending or ascending order. By default, it returns results in descending order. Possible values are: desc, asc

args.name: sortOn
args.info: Sort on popularity or time start. By default, sorts on popularity. Possible values are: popularity, time_start

args.name: startDate
args.info: Will return events that only begin at or after the specified time.

args.name: endDate
args.info: Will return events that only end at or before the specified time.

args.name: categories
args.info: The category filter can be a list of comma delimited categories to get OR'd results that include the categories provided.

args.name: isFree
args.info: Filter whether the events are free to attend. By default no filter is applied so both free and paid events will be returned.

args.name: location
args.info: Specifies the combination of `address, neighborhood, city, state or zip, optional country` to be used when searching for events.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The location you want to search nearby.

args.name: radius
args.info: Search radius in meters.

args.name: excludedEvents
args.info: List of event ids. Events associated with these event ids in this list will not show up in the response.

blocks.name: getFeaturedEvent
blocks.description: This endpoint returns the featured event for a given location. Featured events are chosen by Yelp's community managers.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: locale
args.info: Specify the locale to return the autocomplete suggestions in.

args.name: location
args.info: Specifies the combination of `address, neighborhood, city, state or zip, optional country` to be used when searching for events.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The location you want to search nearby.

blocks.name: matchedBusinesses
blocks.description: These endpoints let you match business data from other sources against businesses on Yelp, based on minimal provided information.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access Token obtained from getAccessToken endpoint.

args.name: type
args.info: Must be best or lookup

args.name: name
args.info: The name of the business. Maximum length is 64; only digits, letters, spaces, and !#$%&+,­./:?@'are allowed.

args.name: address1
args.info: The first line of the business’s address. Maximum length is 64; only digits, letters, spaces, and ­’/#&,.: are allowed.

args.name: address2
args.info: The second line of the business’s address. Maximum length is 64; only digits, letters, spaces, and ­’/#&,.: are allowed.

args.name: address3
args.info: The third line of the business’s address. Maximum length is 64; only digits, letters, spaces, and ­’/#&,.: are allowed.

args.name: city
args.info: The city of the business. Maximum length is 64; only digits, letters, spaces, and ­’.() are allowed.

args.name: state
args.info: The ISO 3166-2 (with a few exceptions) state code of this business. Maximum length is 3.

args.name: country
args.info: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of this business. Maximum length is 2.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: The location you want to search nearby.

args.name: phone
args.info: The phone number of the business which can be submitted as (a) locally ­formatted with digits only (e.g., 016703080) or (b) internationally­ formatted with a leading + sign and digits only after (+35316703080). Maximum length is 32.

args.name: postalCode
args.info: The postal code of the business. Maximum length is 12.

args.name: yelpBusinessId
args.info: Unique Yelp identifier of the business if available. Used as a hint when finding a matching business.
